name: 4WorldParkour
description:
4WorldParkour is a rage game in which you can't:

-Look up

-Look down

And there isin't/aren't:

-A restart button (you need to close the game and open it again to get back to the start)

-Checkpoints

At the moment we are testing the idea. Maybe,in the future,we will make a full game out of this.
